perturbation.original_text: Any controversy between the parties arising under this Agreement and not resolved by the parties shall be determined in accordance with the laws of the State of Michigan.
perturbation.changed_text: Any controversy between the parties arising under this Agreement and not resolved by the parties shall be determined in accordance with the Notices and Communications section.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the governing law clause to a section that describes how to send notices creates ambiguity and makes it difficult to ascertain which jurisdiction's laws govern the contract. This weakens the enforceability of the agreement by obscuring the applicable legal framework.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law Principles Regarding Choice of Law

perturbation.original_text: It is agreed that no personal liability whatsoever shall attach to, be imposed on or otherwise be incurred by any Partner, agent, management official or employee of the Transporter or any director, officer or employee of any of the foregoing, for any obligation of the Transporter arising under this Agreement or for any claim based on such obligation and that the sole recourse of Shipper under this Agreement is limited to assets of the Transporter.
perturbation.changed_text: It is agreed that no personal liability whatsoever shall attach to, be imposed on or otherwise be incurred by any Partner, agent, management official or employee of the Transporter or any director, officer or employee of any of the foregoing, for any obligation of the Transporter arising under this Agreement or for any claim based on such obligation and that the sole recourse of Shipper under this Agreement is limited to assets of the Transporter, unless specified in Appendix A.
perturbation.explanation: Adding 'unless specified in Appendix A' to the clause limiting liability introduces a contradiction. The main agreement asserts limited recourse to the transporter's assets, but Appendix A outlines the operating pressures. This contradiction creates ambiguity about whether specific terms in Appendix A can override the liability limitation, potentially undermining the protection afforded to the transporter's personnel.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law Principles Regarding Limitation of Liability

12.
INCORPORATION OF TARIFF INTO AGREEMENT:
This Agreement shall incorporate and in all respects be subject to the "General Terms and Conditions" and the applicable Rate
Schedule (as stated above) set forth in Transporter's FERC Gas Tariff, Third Revised Volume No. 1, as may be revised from time
to time. This incorporation is not applicable in cases of conflicting details in APPENDIX A. Transporter may file and seek Commission approval under Section 4 of the Natural Gas Act (NGA) at any time and from

"General Terms and Conditions" in Transporter's FERC Gas Tariff, Third Revised Volume No. 1, and Transporter shall have the

and any such changes
perturbation.explanation: By adding "This incorporation is not applicable in cases of conflicting details in APPENDIX A", the clause is changed such that the incorporation of the FERC gas tariff is rendered uncertain. This means the rates are uncertain, making the original legal text have a contradiction. This weakens enforceability by creating a contradiction regarding which details hold true in the contract.
